description: John Carroll Kirby is an artist and an in-demand musical collaborator for artists like Solange, Frank Ocean, Sebastian Tellier, Connan Mockasin, and countless others. Kirby has lately focused on his own prolific solo output with his forthcoming album, Dance Ancestral, following four other LPs on Stones Throw Records: his debut My Garden (2020); the ambient piano record Conflict (2020); his first film score, Cryptozoo: Original Motion Picture Soundtrack (2021), and the jazz-fusion record Septet (2021).
title: JOHN CARROLL KIRBY
